title: US Prospect Artem Shmidt Joins Ineos Grenadiers: ‘He’s An Exciting Young Talent’
content:
The 20-year-old will race the Tour de l'Avenir, and then join Ineos Grenadiers for the remainder of the 2024 racing season: 'He's impressed us.'

Read the full article at US Prospect Artem Shmidt Joins Ineos Grenadiers: ‘He’s An Exciting Young Talent’ on Velo.
author: ahood
